biotools.summary: A resource for experimentally validated human and mouse enhancers. Users can retrieve elements near single genes of interest, search for enhancers that target reporter gene expression to a particular tissue, or download entire collections of enhancers with a defined tissue specificity or conservation depth.

bioschemas.name: VISTA Enhancer Browser
bioschemas.summary: A resource for experimentally validated human and mouse enhancers. Users can retrieve elements near single genes of interest, search for enhancers that target reporter gene expression to a particular tissue, or download entire collections of enhancers with a defined tissue specificity or conservation depth.
